HIGHLIGHT 
• 
5 years of experienced in software development. 
• 
Strong experience in OOP, ASP.NET MVC, software design. 
• 
Familiar with Agile Methodology: SCRUM. 
• 
Very fast learner and problem solver. Ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadline.  
• 
Experience in working with foreign customers. 
• 
Good knowledge in .Net Framework, OOP, Design Pattern, DI/IoC. 
• 
Proficient in LINQ, Entity Framework, ... 
• 
Extensive knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, Bootstrap, Angular 
Material, ...

RELEVANT PROJECTS 
LOWELL - UK 
Sep 2018 – Now 
Senior Developer 
Develop new platform (website, interface application)for Lowell that is a debt company who 
purchase outstanding balances from a variety of businesses. That help you to take control of your 
debt by not adding interest and agreeing realistic and affordable repayment plans. Today, 
Lowell ODC is a top biggest project in Nashtech with more than 90 employees working on that. 
Duties 
Technologies

document, coding convention, code review.

ACHILLES – UK 
3 
Apr 2018 – Aug 2018/ Developer 
Aug 2018 – Nov 2018/ Team Lead 
Develop new platform for Achilles customer for Procurement & Risk management. We designed 
our community model, our supporting services and the technology that powers them to address 
something buyers needed. Achilles wanted to drive a new kind of procurement with less risk, less 
cost and less compliance issues. At the same time, wanted to bring suppliers into the fold – to 
help them meet buyers’ needs while reducing their own qualification burdens. 
Today, Achilles is a top biggest project in Nashtech with more than 90 employees working on 
that. 
Duties

PXP - UK 
Sep 2017 – Mar 2018 
Developer 
The project is to build/enhance the ANYpay POS gateway with PXP team. The PXP Financial 
team has 50 years of combined experience shaping and leading innovation in the payments 
space. As a leading payments provider, PXP Financial sets standards of operational excellence, 
best-in-class service and dedicated client care, to help businesses thrive.

experiences.detail:
Develop new platform for Achilles customer for Procurement & Risk management. We designed our community model, our supporting services and the technology that powers them to address something buyers needed. Achilles wanted to drive a new kind of procurement with less risk, less cost and less compliance issues. At the same time, wanted to bring suppliers into the fold - to help them meet buyers’ needs while reducing their own qualification burdens.
Today, Achilles is a top biggest project in Nashtech with more than 90 employees working on that.
